attributes.action: ensure that the charge for any new combined passport and identity card is no more in this country than it is in the majority of other EU countries who are installing this system under the same set of EU regulations.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is possible to obtain a passport in Spain for GBP12.00p.  How is it possible, then, that a passport in England can cost GBP93.00p?  All EU countries are required to produce biometrical identity documents of the same standard so why is it cheaper in 
Spain than it is in England?
